title: Trump to Biden: 'Stop selling the wall'
shortDescription: Trump is calling on President Biden to "stop selling the wall," but the White House said it is following the law for unused wall pieces.

title: Biden designates Frances Perkins National Monument
shortDescription: President Joe Biden signed the proclamation honoring the nation's longest serving labor secretary and first woman cabinet member, Frances Perkins.

title: Trump says he will fire federal employees who won't return to office
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump said he'd fire federal workers who won't return to the office and also challenge in court a Biden-era deal on the issue.

title: Trump weighs in after Duke lacrosse accuser admits false rape claim
shortDescription: Crystal Magnum admitted that her 2006 allegation that three Duke lacrosse players raped her was false.

title: Trump alleges Biden, military leaders know more about mysterious drone sightings
shortDescription: Donald Trump accused US government officials, including Joe Biden, of knowing more about the mysterious drone sightings than they have told the public.

title: Trump, 'big believer' in polio vaccine, continues support for RFK Jr.
shortDescription: The president-elect told reporters Monday he supports the polio vaccine, as his pick for health secretary is scrutinized for anti-vaccine stances.

title: Trump: 'Don't know' if DeSantis will pick Lara Trump for Rubio Senate seat
shortDescription: Donald Trump told reporters on Monday that he doesn’t know if Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis will choose Lara Trump to fill Sen. Marco Rubio’s seat.

title: Trump: 'Unreasonable' senators opposing nominees should be primaried
shortDescription: Trump supported challenges to senators who oppose his nominees for "political" or "stupid" reasons.

title: Trump says he would consider pardoning New York City Mayor Eric Adams
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump said Monday he would consider pardoning New York Mayor Eric Adams, who has allied with Trump over immigration.

title: Trump says he has a 'warm spot' for TikTok as app faces US ban
shortDescription: Trump told reporters that he believed the social media app helped him gain ground with young voters in the 2024 election.

title: Man pleads guilty to falsely claiming Joe, Hunter Biden took bribes
shortDescription: Alexander Smirnov's false accusation about President Joe Biden and his son Hunter were a key element in House GOP inquiries before being discredited.

title: Trump announces $100 billion tech firm investment
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump announced a $100 billion investment from Japanese tech firm SoftBank, while asking its CEO to raise it to $200 billion.

title: Trump announces Japanese tech firm will invest $100 billion in US projects
shortDescription: Trump promised during the 2024 presidential campaign to bolster manufacturing and level tariffs against some of the country's top trading partners.

title: Germany's leader loses confidence vote. Now what?
shortDescription: Germany is expected to hold a snap election in February next year. Political turmoil at the heart of Europe is also taking place in France.

title: Supreme Court stays out of Trump adviser's fight to keep White House emails
shortDescription: Peter Navarro, a trade adviser to President-elect Donald Trump, does not want to give the National Archives all his work-related emails from the first Trump administration.

title: Does Trump support gay marriage? Here's what he's said
shortDescription: Donald Trump has had varying views on gay marriage in recent decades. Here's what to know ahead of his inauguration in 2025.

title: Trump team wants to scrap car crash requirement opposed by Elon Musk's Tesla
shortDescription: The Trump transition team wants the incoming administration to drop a car-crash reporting requirement opposed by Elon Musk’s Tesla.

title: Trump loyalist Richard Grenell named envoy for special missions
shortDescription: A U.S. ambassador and acting national intelligence chief in Trump's first administration, Grenell has also sparked controversy.

title: Trump picks Truth Social CEO Nunes to lead intelligence board
shortDescription: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump on Saturday named ally Devin Nunes to serve as chairman of President's Intelligence Advisory Board.

title: ABC to pay $15M to Trump library to settle lawsuit, documents show
shortDescription: ABC News has agreed to give $15 million to U.S. President-elect Donald Trump’s presidential library to settle a lawsuit.
